TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit Menu/MenuItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type Menu.MenuItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示存储在、 或中的对象的集合。This class represents the collection of objects stored in a , , or . 对于和类, 此集合表示控件的整个菜单结构。For the and classes, this collection represents the entire menu structure for the control. 对于类, 此集合表示与关联的子菜单项的列表。 For the class, this collection represents the list of submenu items associated with the . 使用 和方法可以在集合中添加和移除单个菜单项。The and methods enable you to add and remove individual menu items from the collection. 你还可以使用方法从集合中移除所有菜单项。You can also use the method to remove all the menu items from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类要求将集合与派生自的类 (例如、 或类) 相关联。This class requires that you associate the collection with a class that derives from , such as the , , or class. 由于您必须指定与此集合关联的菜单, 因此您不能创建多个菜单项集合并根据需要将其与菜单相关联。Since you must specify a menu that is associated with this collection, you cannot create multiple menu item collections and associate them with a menu as needed. 若要切换与菜单关联的菜单项, 您必须清除项的集合并添加要显示到集合的菜单项。In order to switch the menu items associated with a menu, you must clear the collection of items and add the menu items to display to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次只能包含在一个菜单中, 不能将多次添加到同一个菜单。A can only be contained in one menu at a time, and cannot be added more than once to the same menu. 若要在多个菜单中重复使用, 请使用类的方法。To reuse a in more than one menu, use the method of the class. 若要删除先前添加的, 请使用方法。To remove a that you have previously added, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类创建一个主菜单, `mainMenu1`该菜单将两个对象添加到其集合中。The following code example uses the derived class to create a main menu, `mainMenu1`, that has two objects added to its collection. 然后, 该代码`mainMenu1`将分配给的属性。The code then assigns `mainMenu1` to the property of the . 此示例要求在此示例中定义的代码以窗体形式出现。This example requires that the code defined in this example is located with in a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次只能包含在一个菜单中, 不能将多次添加到同一个菜单。A can only be contained in one menu at a time, and cannot be added more than once to the same menu. 若要在多个菜单中重复使用, 请使用类的方法。To reuse a in more than one menu, use the method of the class. 若要删除先前添加的, 请使用方法。To remove a that you have previously added, use the method. 此版本的方法允许您将以前创建的对象添加到集合中的特定索引位置。This version of the method allows you to add previously created objects to a specific index location within the collection. 当前位于该索引处的任何位置以及该索引之后的所有对象都将移动到集合中下一个最小的索引处。Any currently located at that index, and all objects after that index, are moved to the next lowest index in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建派生类的实例, 并将对象添加到菜单项集合中特定位置处的对象集合。The following code example creates an instance of the derived class, , and adds a object to its collection of objects at a specific location in the menu item collection. 此示例要求在此示例中定义的方法位于窗体的类中, 并由该窗体类中的方法调用。This example requires that the method defined in this example is located within the class for a form and called by a method in that form class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次只能包含在一个菜单中, 不能将多次添加到同一个菜单。A can only be contained in one menu at a time, and cannot be added more than once to the same menu. 若要在多个菜单中重复使用, 请使用类的方法。To reuse a in more than one menu, use the method of the class. 若要删除先前添加的, 请使用方法。To remove a that you have previously added, use the method. 此版本的方法允许您指定菜单项的标题和用于处理事件的委托。This version of the method allows you to specify a caption for the menu item and a delegate to handle the event. 如果你的应用程序已具有用于处理事件的事件处理程序, 则可以使用此版本的方法。You can use this version of the method if your application already has an event handler to handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 对于包含子菜单项的 ,不会引发事件。The event is not raised for a that contains submenu items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类创建一个主菜单, `mainMenu1`该菜单将两个对象添加到其集合中。The following code example uses the derived class to create a main menu, `mainMenu1`, that has two objects added to its collection. 此代码使用方法的此版本为添加到集合中的第二个菜单项的事件定义事件处理程序。The code uses this version of the method to define an event handler for the event of the second menu item added to the collection. 然后, 该代码`mainMenu1`将分配给的属性。The code then assigns `mainMenu1` to the property of the . 此示例要求在此示例中定义的代码位于窗体中。This example requires that the code defined in this example is located within a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次只能包含在一个菜单中, 不能将多次添加到同一个菜单。A can only be contained in one menu at a time, and cannot be added more than once to the same menu. 若要在多个菜单中重复使用, 请使用类的方法。To reuse a in more than one menu, use the method of the class. 若要删除先前添加的, 请使用方法。To remove a that you have previously added, use the method. 此版本的方法允许您为菜单项和将处理其事件的委托指定标题。This version of the method allows you to specify a caption for the menu item and a delegate that will handle its event. 如果你的应用程序已具有用于处理事件的事件处理程序, 则可以使用此版本的方法。You can use this version of the method if your application already has an event handler to handle the event. 此版本的方法还允许您指定要添加到集合中的以前创建的对象的数组。This version of the method also allows you to specify an array of previously created objects that you want to add to the collection. 您可以使用此功能重复 使用已通过方法克隆的现有对象。You can use this feature to reuse existing objects that have been cloned using the method. 如果参数不为空或`null`, 则添加到集合中的将包含子菜单项。 `items`If the `items` parameter is not empty or `null`, the being added to the collection will contain submenu items. > [!NOTE] > 对于包含子菜单项的 ,不会引发事件。The event is not raised for a that contains submenu items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用方法将一组以前创建的对象快速添加到集合, 而不是使用方法手动将它们添加到集合中。You can use method to quickly add a group of previously created objects to the collection instead of manually adding each to the collection using the method. 如果集合已包含对象, 则调用此方法会将新对象添加到集合的末尾。If the collection already contains objects, calling this method will add the new objects to the end of the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个数组, 并将两个对象中的对象复制到数组中。The following code example creates an array and copies the objects from two objects into the array. 然后, 该示例将对象的数组复制到名`contextMenu1`为的控件集合中。The example then copies the array of objects into the control collection for a named `contextMenu1`. 此示例要求有两个对象包含名为`menuItem1`和`menuItem2`的子菜单项。This example requires that there are two objects that contain submenu items named `menuItem1` and `menuItem2`. span.span: The number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含分配给集合的对象数。 `Count`The `Count` property holds the number of objects assigned to the collection. 您可以使用`Count`属性值作为循环的上限来循环访问集合。You can use the `Count` property value as the upper bounds of a loop to iterate through a collection. 请记住, 集合的索引值是从零开始的索引, 因此必须从循环变量中减去一个。Keep in mind, the index value of a collection is a zero-based index, so you must subtract one from the looping variable. 如果不考虑这一点, 则会超出集合的上限并引发异常。If you do not account for this, you will exceed the upper bounds of the collection and throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个主菜单`myMainMenu`, 其中包含一个, `File`其中包含三个子菜单项: `New`、 `Open`和`Exit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with one , `File`, that has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用属性可以计算`File`菜单中的对象数, 并在消息框中显示此数字。 `Count`Using the `Count` property, you count the number of objects in the `File` menu and display this number in a message box. 此示例要求您已经创建了一个名为`Form1`的。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/CPP/countitems.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/CS/countitems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/VB/countitems.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果连续调用, 最后返回的索引将首先检查键匹配项, 如果没有匹配项, 则从集合的开头开始搜索。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection. 属性对应于中 的的键。 The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 密钥比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果参数为`null`或空字符串, 或者没有匹配项, 则返回-1。 `key`If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, or there are no matches, returns -1.

span.span: The to remove.

summary.span: 从菜单项集合中移除指定的 。

span.span: Removes the specified from the menu item collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从菜单项集合中移除时, 将在集合中的一个位置上移所有后续菜单项。When a is removed from the menu item collection, all subsequent menu items are moved up one position in the collection. 使用此版本`Remove`的可以从集合中删除特定的, 使用对要删除的的引用。You can use this version of the `Remove` to remove a specific from the collection using a reference to the to be removed. 如果你没有引用要删除的 , 则可以使用此方法的另一个版本, 该方法接受作为参数, 这是一个与要移除的相对应的索引。If you do not have a reference to the that you want to remove, you can use the other version of this method that accepts, as a parameter, an index corresponding to the to be removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何`myMainMenu`创建具有两个对象`File`的主菜单和`Edit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with two objects, `File` and `Edit`. 菜单包含三个子菜单项: `New`、 `Open`和`Exit`。 `File`The `File` menu has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用方法, 您可以从`File`菜单`Open`集合中删除该项。 `Remove`Using the `Remove` method, you remove the `Open` item from the `File` menu collection. 此示例要求您已经创建了一个名为`Form1`的。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/CPP/removeitems.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/CS/removeitems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/VB/removeitems.vb#1)]
